statement: Her brothers were always playing tricks on her.
Baseball is played on a field.
The Sun makes the sky so bright that you can't see other stars in the day.
The Sun is the brightest star in our galaxy.
You can see many stars in the night sky.
She gave her book to the teacher.
I saw a colorful bird flying in the sky.
She was the first student to finish the homework.
Please turn the page when you finish reading.
